A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''December 31, 2009''', at 20:33 UTC.<ref name="-2033">{{cite IRC log|Adura|file=2009-12-31_#minecraft.log|tz=standard|date=December 31, 2009|"(15:33:46) <Notch> YAY, mouse look is working properly in indev now"}}</ref> It was announced on [[The Word of Notch|TWoN]] at 20:42 UTC.<ref>[[wordofnotch:310183062|Partial update on /indev/, more to come]] – The Word of Notch, December 31, 2009</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Finally fixed mouse movement code.<ref name="-2033"/>
